name: VOID Software
description:
Catering for customers in multiple geographies, VOID Software has brought added value through a team of experienced and passionate programmers, in products ranging from financial services to media management systems to digital asset management and backends for large public entities, implementing cloud services, SaaS, custom-built hardware, web and mobile applications.
Today the company employs 22 direct persons, with additional variable resources available to grow the teams as needed for each particular case, allowing for the mobilisation of multidisciplinary groups specialising in Big Data, SaaS, mobile, UI/UX, Backend and Quality.
 
READ MORE...

locations.address: R António da Silva Valverde, 56 Lj B
